arts.ttl: Chelsea and Marseille reach agreement over Aaron Anselmino loan move
arts.sum: Chelsea and Marseille have reached an agreement over a loan move for Aaron Anselmino (19), according to Fabrizio Romano. The 19-year-old centre-back spent the first part of the 2024-2025 season…

arts.ttl: Fiorentina Eye Marseille’s Kone to Bolster Midfield
arts.sum: Fiorentina continue to be one of the most active clubs in the winter transfer window, with their latest target being Ismael Kone, the Canadian midfielder currently playing for Marseille. The 22-year-old, born in Ivory Coast but representing Canada internationally, has caught the attention of several European clubs, including Valencia and Rennes. The post Fiorentina Eye Marseille’s Kone to Bolster Midfield appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Fagioli Remains on the Market: Juventus-Milan Talks and Fiorentina-Marseille Intrigue
arts.sum: As the transfer window enters its final days, clubs are scrambling to finalize deals for players seeking more playing time. Among them is Nicolò Fagioli, the Juventus midfielder who has yet to secure a move away from Turin. The post Fagioli Remains on the Market: Juventus-Milan Talks and Fiorentina-Marseille Intrigue appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.ttl: Nice drops to fifth in Ligue 1 after draw at Toulouse ahead of Marseille vs. Lyon
arts.sum: Later Sunday, new coach Paulo Fonseca took charge of his first game for Lyon away to second-place Marseille. Nice dropped to fifth place in the French league after conceding a late goal in a 1-1 draw at Toulouse on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Lyon sign Dash, Brazil star Tarciane for record fee
arts.sum: Brazil international Tarciane has completed her transfer from Houston Dash to Lyon, the NWSL side confirmed on Sunday.
